content:
The most effective way to reduce the number of hostile shocks in managed airbags is to fight the carriers of these ammunition.

This was stated“Only news”.

“There are many such bombs in Russia, and they try to exhaust our air defense system. Our main task is to fight directly with the carriers, it is the Su-34 and Su-35 aircraft, ”said Elijah Yevlash.

He noted that the destruction of such aircraft requires operational and tactical skills and skillful use of appropriate complexes.

“And most importantly, more Western systems are needed. We rely on our partners in this matter, ”Elijah Yevlash added.

Earlier in the Air Force of the Armed Forcestoldthat the military of the Russian Federation began to use upgraded fugas aviation bombs for strikes in the frontal regions of Ukraine, in particular in Kharkiv.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the evening of March 31, the invaders hit Kharkiv with two UMPB D-30 (unified interspecific planning ammunition, 30 cm caliber). Ammunition of this type is released from the aircraft.
title: In the air forces explained how to fight hostile booths
description: This was stated by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Elijah Yevlash on the air of the TEMACHAFON ...
author: Army Inform
